name: anki-leo
description: Chrome extension to export dictionary from LinguaLeo to CSV/Anki

scripts.build: yarn build:locales && parcel build src/manifest.json --no-minify && sed -i '' '1s;^;var ;' ./dist/js/index.js
scripts.release:package: yarn build && cd dist/ && cross-zip . ../anki-leo.zip && cd -
scripts.release: yarn lint && yarn test && yarn release:package && yarn release:version

author: Kosta Korenkov
